title: Poster, ca. 1988
inscribed: Text of letter: ""Dear President Reagan, So called freedom fighters attack schools, health centers and granaries, especially targeting health workers,teachers and missionaries...I condemn you and the U.S. government for initiating and escalating the spirit of genocide and holocaust." From Duncan Bassett Murphy WWII Veteran, currently on hunger strike against aid to the Contras."
creditline: Gift of Steven Heller and Karrie Jacobs

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, ca. 1988.
ca. 1988. Support: Paper. Gift of Steven Heller and Karrie Jacobs. 1993-53-76.
